name: Narration_Elaboration
description:
Game Instruction:

WASD to move;

Space to interact with NPC ;

up key and down key to select the option;

Enter key to confirm the selection;

mouse left button to shoot the bullets;

This game combines the traditional rpg  with puzzle elements, while involving some top down shooting elements that constantly give players thrilling situations in which the player have to evade  the chasing of monsters while answering the right answer.
